actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove certain limitations presently imposed upon the types of optometric services which are covered under the medicare program, and thereby to provide coverage under such program for all of the services normally provided by an optometrist.

summary.text: Removes under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act limitations presently imposed upon the types of optometric services which are covered under the medicare program. Provides coverage under such program for all of the services normally provided by an optometrist.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove certain limitations presently imposed upon the types of optometric services which are covered under the medicare program, and thereby to provide coverage under such program for all of the services normally provided by an optometrist.
